name: Team Galactic’s Invention G-103 Power Spray
effect: You may play this card during your opponent’s turn when your opponent’s Pokémon uses any Poké-Power. Prevent all effects of that Poké-Power. (This counts as that Pokémon using its Poké-Power.) If you have 2 or less Pokémon SP in play, you can’t play this card.
author: Yusuke Ishikawa
